title: Covid Exposure Apps Are Headed for a Mass Extinction Event
description: The US government will pull the plug on the servers powering the nation’s Covid notifications on May 11. States aren’t rushing to boot up replacements.

title: OpenAI’s CEO Says the Age of Giant AI Models Is Already Over
description: Sam Altman says the research strategy that birthed ChatGPT is played out and future strides in artificial intelligence will require new ideas.

title: I’m Reddit’s CEO and Think Regulating Social Media Is Tyranny. AITA?
description: Steve Huffman kicked Nazis and other trolls off the platform. He also argues that any government oversight of online content is authoritarian.
